member.name: T:SpeedGameApp.Business.Data.PartyContext
member.summary: The party context.
member.remarks: DEPRECATED: This class violates the Single Responsibility Principle and has been split into: - for storage operations - for game state management - for event publishing - for theme management This class is kept for backwards compatibility and will be removed in a future version.
